data.text: Tegelezeni gano mweye iwanhu wa isi zose,
Wose, iwakulu na iwadodo,
Mulomo wangu olonga mbuli za ubala,
Notega gwiti jangu nhegeleze nongezi,
Habali nidumbe siku za magazo,
Awo otamanila vinhu vao,
Haduhu munhu yoyose yodaha kuugombola ugima wa munhu iyagwe,
kwavija bei ya ugima ibanza ng'hani,
ili yakale mgima milele,
Avo wose okona kamba iwanhu wabala odanganika,
Mapanga gao gokuwa ng'anda zao milele,
Munhu muutajili wake hasigala siku zose,
Kino acho kimambukizo cha awo oitamanila mwenyego,
Kamba ng'hondolo ochola kuzimu,
Lakini Imulungu konigombola kulawa kuzimu,
Sambi udumbe munhu yahapata utajili,
kwavija yahadanganika hasola kinhu chochose,
Hamoja viyakalile mgima kayona kamweda,
kochola kwa iwahenga zake wadanganike mwaka,
Munhu yeli tajili lakini kabule nzewele,
